survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Subscription-Based Pet Food Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers of subscription-based pet food services to evaluate satisfaction levels and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current subscription-based pet food service?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current subscription-based pet food service?

questions.question_text: Which of the following features do you value most in your pet food subscription service? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to identify key value propositions. Include an 'Other' option for flexibility.

script.question_text: Which of the following features do you value most in your pet food subscription service? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you encounter issues with your pet food delivery (e.g., late deliveries, incorrect items)?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point frequency scale. This helps identify logistical pain points.

script.question_text: How often do you encounter issues with your pet food delivery (e.g., late deliveries, incorrect items)?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your pet food subscription service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your pet food subscription service?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend your pet food subscription service to others?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to measure Net Promoter Score (NPS) potential.

script.question_text: Would you recommend your pet food subscription service to others?
